text: I have a grouped dataframe, on the column id, I want to delete group with worker id == "asdf", for the life of me I can't figure it out. Help?

elements.text: I have a grouped dataframe, on the column id, I want to delete group with worker id == "asdf", for the life of me I can't figure it out. Help?

text: probably easiest to do without a grouped data frame, just do `filter(:id => !=("asdf"), df)`
